title: Wellington Paranormal
brief_description: New Zealand’s capital is a hotbed of supernatural activity… so Officers Minogue and O’Leary, who featured in the vampire documentary What We Do In The Shadows, take to the streets to investigate all manner of paranormal phenomena.

constellations_other.name: Spooky shadows
constellations_other.description: Hellish and hilarious vampires connect pioneering German cinema to contemporary New Zealand comedy with a quick detour into small town strangeness.
